listitem.para: Command that assigns the value value to the variable named varname, which must be a word. Variable names are case-insensitive. If a variable with the same name already exists, the value of that variable is changed. If not, a new global variable is created.
This is the same as MAKE but with the inputs in reverse order.

listitem.programlisting: NAME [Hello how are you] "foo SHOW :foo [Hello how are you]
